1370: Meinoldo was born in Nieu straet in 1370.
1375: Lost sibling Thitardo in 1375 when Thitardo was 5.
1379: Lost mother at the age of 9.
Pelegrim took care of Meinoldo since Meinoldo was 10.
1380: Lost father at the age of 10.
Left Nieu straet.A.2 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 11.
1381: Lost sibling Godelief in 1381 when Godelief was 3.
1387: Meinoldo moved to In den Haeg.A.3 in 1387.
Left orphanage at the age of 18.
1388: Got married to Gertrudis at age 19 in 1388.
Had Gertrudis move in at In den Haeg.A.3 after marriage.
1389: Had a son with Gertrudis, Dilane, at age 19.
1390: Lost his wife Gertrudis while she was giving birth to Linnea in 1390.
1392: Got married a second time to Nannen at age 23 in 1392.
Had Nannen move in at In den Haeg.A.3 after marriage.
1393: Had a daughter with Nannen, Tetta, at age 23.
1394: Had a daughter with Nannen, Verthwi, at age 24.
1395: Had a daughter with Nannen, Agota, at age 25.
Lost daughter Verthwi when Verthwi was 2 years old.
1397: Had a son with Nannen, Anthonius, at age 27.
1398: Had a son with Nannen, Rembrecht, at age 28.
